title: Five-Star Sentosa Stay with Decadent Dining
description: Indulge in a luxury five-star Singapore experience with a stay at the Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa. A relaxing island break just off the coast of Singapore with fun family activities for all ages, Sentosa is a must when travelling to Singapore. Enjoy flexible dining options with daily buffet breakfast, a choice of daily lunch or dinner, a 30-minute massage each at the hotel’s award-winning So SPA and more included.
location_description: Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa - JAN 2018

title: Five-Star Sofitel Indulgence on Sentosa Island
description: Indulge in a five-star luxury Singapore experience with a five-night stay at the Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, delicious nightly dinners, two 30-minute massages at the largest SO Spa in the world, welcome drinks on arrival and more for two adults.
location_description: Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa OLD

title: Five-Star Sentosa Stay with Decadent Dining Inclusions
description: Indulge in a five-star Singapore experience with a stay at the Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa. A relaxing island break just off the coast, Sentosa is a must when visiting Singapore. Putting you within easy reach of all Singapore’s best shopping, theme parks and attractions, but far away from the hustle and bustle of the city, a stay at Sofitel Singapore Sentosa is the ideal choice for every kind of traveller. Enjoy flexible dining options with daily buffet breakfast, a choice of daily lunch or dinner, a 30-minute massage each at the hotel’s award-winning So SPA and more included.
location_description: Sofitel Singapore Sentosa Resort & Spa - Sep 2019

title: Iconic Five-Star Capella Luxury on Sentosa Island Moments from the Beach with World-Class Spa
description: Capella Singapore, recognised as the Best Hotel Brand in the World and the Best Hotel in Singapore by Travel + Leisure, has set an unparalleled standard for five-star luxury on Sentosa Island. Centred around two 19th century colonial bungalows and framed by the sea, Capella strives to curate moments of simple indulgence. Auriga Spa boasts 12 consecutive years of Forbes Travel Guide's five-star status, gathering traditional wellness techniques and modern innovation to provide bespoke service across nine treatment suites. The dining is impeccable, with Chinese cuisine inspired by an historic spice route, Italian comfort food elevated for fine dining and handcrafted tipples with panoramic views. With a cascade of shimmering pools just moments from the beach and dedicated culturists to pave your path of discovery, Capella Singapore compromises on nothing.

title: Singapore's Only Beachfront Resort: Five-Star Shangri-La Sentosa Island Luxury
description:
Overlooking the glistening South China Sea, surrounded by crystal blue water and tucked in an enclave where you can walk straight onto a private patch of champagne beachfront, the renowned Shangri-La Rasa Sentosa is Singapore's only beachfront resort. The resort offers five-star glamour within easy reach of the city (it's just 30 minutes from Singapore Airport), with the distinctive feel of an overseas island escape.

Bespoke experiences for adrenaline seekers, families and couples await at this island oasis. Be wined and dined in your choice of four restaurants and two bars, relax at the tranquil Chi, The Spa, plunge into two swimming pools, or let the kids loose at Toots Kids’ Club and Nestopia’s unique outdoor play space on Siloso Beach. This Shangri-La haven is your gateway to Southeast Asia’s first Universal Studios, S.E.A. Aquarium and Mega Adventure Park. When you've had your fix of island fun, hop over to mainland Singapore for shopping on Orchard Road, Chinatown, Little India and Clarke Quay via the nearby MRT or causeway.
